verses.verse: And the rulers <WH8269> of the people <WH5971> dwelt <WH3427> at Jerusalem <WH3389>: the rest <WH7605> of the people <WH5971> also cast <WH5307> lots <WH1486>, to bring <WH935> one <WH259> of ten <WH6235> to dwell <WH3427> in Jerusalem <WH3389> the holy <WH6944> city <WH5892>, and nine <WH8672> parts <WH3027> to dwell in other cities <WH5892>.
And the people <WH5971> blessed <WH1288> all the men <WH582>, that willingly offered <WH5068> themselves to dwell <WH3427> at Jerusalem <WH3389>.

¶ Now these are the chief <WH7218> of the province <WH4082> that dwelt <WH3427> in Jerusalem <WH3389>: but in the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063> dwelt <WH3427> every one <WH376> in his possession <WH272> in their cities <WH5892>, to wit, Israel <WH3478>, the priests <WH3548>, and the Levites <WH3881>, and the Nethinims <WH5411>, and the children <WH1121> of Solomon's <WH8010> servants <WH5650>.

And at Jerusalem <WH3389> dwelt <WH3427> certain of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063>, and of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144>. Of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063>; Athaiah <WH6265> the son <WH1121> of Uzziah <WH5818>, the son <WH1121> of Zechariah <WH2148>, the son <WH1121> of Amariah <WH568>, the son <WH1121> of Shephatiah <WH8203>, the son <WH1121> of Mahalaleel <WH4111>, of the children <WH1121> of Perez <WH6557>;

And Maaseiah <WH4641> the son <WH1121> of Baruch <WH1263>, the son <WH1121> of Col-hozeh <WH3626>, the son <WH1121> of Hazaiah <WH2382>, the son <WH1121> of Adaiah <WH5718>, the son <WH1121> of Joiarib <WH3114>, the son <WH1121> of Zechariah <WH2148>, the son <WH1121> of Shiloni <WH8023>.
All the sons <WH1121> of Perez <WH6557> that dwelt <WH3427> at Jerusalem <WH3389> were four <WH702> hundred <WH3967> threescore <WH8346> and eight <WH8083> valiant <WH2428> men <WH582>.

And these are the sons <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144>; Sallu <WH5543> the son <WH1121> of Meshullam <WH4918>, the son <WH1121> of Joed <WH3133>, the son <WH1121> of Pedaiah <WH6305>, the son <WH1121> of Kolaiah <WH6964>, the son <WH1121> of Maaseiah <WH4641>, the son <WH1121> of Ithiel <WH384>, the son <WH1121> of Jesaiah <WH3470>.
And after <WH310> him Gabbai <WH1373>, Sallai <WH5543>, nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> twenty <WH6242> and eight <WH8083>.
And Joel <WH3100> the son <WH1121> of Zichri <WH2147> was their overseer <WH6496>: and Judah <WH3063> the son <WH1121> of Senuah <WH5574> was second <WH4932> over the city <WH5892>.
Of the priests <WH3548>: Jedaiah <WH3048> the son <WH1121> of Joiarib <WH3114>, Jachin <WH3199>.

Seraiah <WH8304> the son <WH1121> of Hilkiah <WH2518>, the son <WH1121> of Meshullam <WH4918>, the son <WH1121> of Zadok <WH6659>, the son <WH1121> of Meraioth <WH4812>, the son <WH1121> of Ahitub <WH285>, was the ruler <WH5057> of the house <WH1004> of God <WH430>.

And their brethren <WH251> that did <WH6213> the work <WH4399> of the house <WH1004> were eight <WH8083> hundred <WH3967> twenty <WH6242> and two <WH8147>: and Adaiah <WH5718> the son <WH1121> of Jeroham <WH3395>, the son <WH1121> of Pelaliah <WH6421>, the son <WH1121> of Amzi <WH557>, the son <WH1121> of Zechariah <WH2148>, the son <WH1121> of Pashur <WH6583>, the son <WH1121> of Malchiah <WH4441>,

And his brethren <WH251>, chief <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1>, two <WH8147> hundred <WH3967> forty <WH705> and two <WH8147>: and Amashai <WH6023> the son <WH1121> of Azareel <WH5832>, the son <WH1121> of Ahasai <WH273>, the son <WH1121> of Meshillemoth <WH4919>, the son <WH1121> of Immer <WH564>,

And their brethren <WH251>, mighty men <WH1368> of valour <WH2428>, an hundred <WH3967> twenty <WH6242> and eight <WH8083>: and their overseer <WH6496> was Zabdiel <WH2068>, the son <WH1121> of one of the great men <WH1419>.
Also of the Levites <WH3881>: Shemaiah <WH8098> the son <WH1121> of Hashub <WH2815>, the son <WH1121> of Azrikam <WH5840>, the son <WH1121> of Hashabiah <WH2811>, the son <WH1121> of Bunni <WH1138>;
And Shabbethai <WH7678> and Jozabad <WH3107>, of the chief <WH7218> of the Levites <WH3881>, had the oversight of the outward <WH2435> business <WH4399> of the house <WH1004> of God <WH430>.

And Mattaniah <WH4983> the son <WH1121> of Micha <WH4316>, the son <WH1121> of Zabdi <WH2067>, the son <WH1121> of Asaph <WH623>, was the principal <WH7218> to begin <WH8462> the thanksgiving <WH3034> in prayer <WH8605>: and Bakbukiah <WH1229> the second <WH4932> among his brethren <WH251>, and Abda <WH5653> the son <WH1121> of Shammua <WH8051>, the son <WH1121> of Galal <WH1559>, the son <WH1121> of Jeduthun <WH3038>.
All the Levites <WH3881> in the holy <WH6944> city <WH5892> were two hundred <WH3967> fourscore <WH8084> and four <WH702>.
Moreover the porters <WH7778>, Akkub <WH6126>, Talmon <WH2929>, and their brethren <WH251> that kept <WH8104> the gates <WH8179>, were an hundred <WH3967> seventy <WH7657> and two <WH8147>.
¶ And the residue <WH7605> of Israel <WH3478>, of the priests <WH3548>, and the Levites <WH3881>, were in all the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063>, every one <WH376> in his inheritance <WH5159>.
But the Nethinims <WH5411> dwelt <WH3427> in Ophel <WH6077>: and Ziha <WH6727> and Gispa <WH1658> were over the Nethinims <WH5411>.

The overseer <WH6496> also of the Levites <WH3881> at Jerusalem <WH3389> was Uzzi <WH5813> the son <WH1121> of Bani <WH1137>, the son <WH1121> of Hashabiah <WH2811>, the son <WH1121> of Mattaniah <WH4983>, the son <WH1121> of Micha <WH4316>. Of the sons <WH1121> of Asaph <WH623>, the singers <WH7891> were over <WH5048> the business <WH4399> of the house <WH1004> of God <WH430>.
For it was the king's <WH4428> commandment <WH4687> concerning them, that a certain portion <WH548> should be for the singers <WH7891>, due <WH1697> for every day <WH3117>.

And Pethahiah <WH6611> the son <WH1121> of Meshezabeel <WH4898>, of the children <WH1121> of Zerah <WH2226> the son <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063>, was at the king's <WH4428> hand <WH3027> in all matters <WH1697> concerning the people <WH5971>.

And for the villages <WH2691>, with their fields <WH7704>, some of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> dwelt <WH3427> at Kirjath-arba <WH7153>, and in the villages <WH2691> thereof, and at Dibon <WH1769>, and in the villages <WH1323> thereof, and at Jekabzeel <WH3343>, and in the villages <WH1323> thereof,
And at Jeshua <WH3442>, and at Moladah <WH4137>, and at Beth-phelet <WH1046>,
And at Hazar-shual <WH2705>, and at Beer-sheba <WH884>, and in the villages <WH1323> thereof,
And at Ziklag <WH6860>, and at Mekonah <WH4368>, and in the villages <WH1323> thereof,
And at En-rimmon <WH5884>, and at Zareah <WH6881>, and at Jarmuth <WH3412>,

Zanoah <WH2182>, Adullam <WH5725>, and in their villages <WH2691>, at Lachish <WH3923>, and the fields <WH7704> thereof, at Azekah <WH5825>, and in the villages <WH1323> thereof. And they dwelt <WH2583> from Beer-sheba <WH884> unto the valley <WH1516> of Hinnom <WH2011>.
The children <WH1121> also of Benjamin <WH1144> from Geba <WH1387> dwelt at Michmash <WH4363>, and Aija <WH5857>, and Beth-el <WH1008>, and in their villages <WH1323>,
And at Anathoth <WH6068>, Nob <WH5011>, Ananiah <WH6055>,
Hazor <WH2674>, Ramah <WH7414>, Gittaim <WH1664>,
Hadid <WH2307>, Zeboim <WH6650>, Neballat <WH5041>,
Lod <WH3850>, and Ono <WH207>, the valley <WH1516> of craftsmen <WH2791> <WH2798>.
And of the Levites <WH3881> were divisions <WH4256> in Judah <WH3063>, and in Benjamin <WH1144>.
